subject: Automobile Racing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Although the National Stock Car Racing Commission said it was tempting to give the driver Carl Long and his crew chief penalties they could “more readily bear,” Long’s appeal was denied.
snippet: Although the National Stock Car Racing Commission said it was tempting to give the driver Carl Long and his crew chief penalties they could “more readily bear,” Long’s appeal was denied.
